query:
SELECT id, questionNumber, questionText, standardDescription, evidenceRequirement, exampleEvidence 
FROM complianceQuestions 
WHERE personType = 'staff' 
ORDER BY sectionId, CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(questionNumber, '.', -1) AS UNSIGNED)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user aVmfAzGaFwUYThZ.5c3d77929c0b --database mF7Zux5nFuxUoJfuPYEPAJ --execute SELECT id, questionNumber, questionText, standardDescription, evidenceRequirement, exampleEvidence 
FROM complianceQuestions
